name: Code-Coverage-Framework

scripts.report:all: npm run dev & npm run report
scripts.dev: concurrently "node test/utils/server.js" "npm run coverage && npx nyc report --reporter=html --report-dir ./coverage"
scripts.qa: node test/utils/server.js & npm run coverage && npx nyc report --reporter=html --silent --report-dir ./coverage --clean && echo 'Report generated!' && start ./coverage/index.html

author: Subhrakanta Sahoo
description: API testing with code coverage using nyc and mocha
